name: Dogelore: the Game
description:
This game was developed a while back, before I joined a group with a similar concept, so this project is essentially cancelled.

WASD or arrow keys to move, Enter to talk

alpha release 0.8

Music credits!

Pixelland by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4222-pixelland
8bit Dungeon Boss by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3330-8bit-dungeon-boss

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3475-captain-scurvy
